00026 #ifndef ROOTFINDINGBASE_H_
00027 #define ROOTFINDINGBASE_H_
00028 
00029 #include "RootFindingCommon.h"
00030 
00031 /**
00032  * \defgroup _roots Parte Generica
00033  * @{
00034  */
00035 
00036 /**
00037  * @brief Estrutura de dados para RootFindingBase
00038  */
00039 struct RootFindingBase
00040 {
00041     RootFindingDoubleT a;
00042     RootFindingDoubleT b;
00043     RootFindingDoubleT x;
00044     RootFindingDoubleT fX;
00045     RootFindingDoubleT e;
00046     muParserHandle_t mupObj;
00047     RootFindingDoubleT* varPtr;
00048 
00049     /**
00050      * @brief Codigo de erro: nao acessar diretamente. Veja \ref RootFindingBaseGetErrorCode
00051      *  e \ref RootFindingBaseGetErrorMessage
00052      */
00053     enum
00054     {
00055         ROOTS_NO_ERROR = 0,
00056         ROOTS_MUP_EVAL_ERROR,
00057         // just to mark RANGE_ERRORS_START
00058         RANGE_ERRORS_START,
00059         /* range errors */
00060         ROOTS_RANGE_ERROR_PROD_FA_FB_NOT_LT_0,
00061         ROOTS_RANGE_ERROR_FA_OR_FB_ISINFINITY,
00062         /* end range errors */
00063         RANGE_ERRORS_END
00064         // just to mark RANGE_ERRORS_END
00065 
00066     } errorCode;
00067 
00068     /**
00069      * @brief Codigo de estado: nao acessar diretamente. Veja \ref RootFindingBaseGetStateCode
00070      *  e \ref RootFindingBaseGetStateMessage
00071      */
00072     enum
00073     {
00074         ROOTS_RANGE_NOT_SET = 0,
00075         ROOTS_READY,
00076         ROOTS_EXACT_ROOT_FOUND
00077     } state;
00078 };
00079 
00080 /**
00081  * @brief Apelido para struct RootFindingBase
00082  */
00083 typedef struct RootFindingBase RootFindingBaseT;
00084 
00085 /**
00086  * @brief Cria o objeto RootFindingBase
00087  * @param mupObj Ponteiro para o objeto muParser contendo a expressao
00088  * @param varPtr Pontero para a variavel relacionada a expressao no objeto
00089  *  muParser referente a qual eixo deve se procurar a raiz
00090  * @return Ponteiro para o objeto criado
00091  */
00092 RootFindingBaseT* RootFindingBaseCreate(muParserHandle_t mupObj, RootFindingDoubleT* varPtr);
00093 
00094 /**
00095  * @brief Apaga o objeto RootFindingBase
00096  * @param obj Ponteiro para o objeto RootFindingBase
00097  */
00098 void RootFindingBaseDelete(RootFindingBaseT* obj);
00099 
00100 /**
00101  * @brief Define o intervalo para procura da raiz
00102  * @param rootsObj Ponteiro para o objeto RootFindingBase
00103  * @param a
00104  * @param b
00105  * @return TRUE em caso de sucesso, quando f(a) * f(b) < 0 'e' f(a),
00106  *  f(b) sejam ambos diferentes de infinito
00107  */
00108 RootFindingBoolT RootFindingBaseSetRange(RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj, RootFindingDoubleT a, RootFindingDoubleT b);
00109 
00110 /**
00111  * @brief Avalia a funcao em um ponto
00112  * @param rootsObj Ponteiro para o objeto struct RootFindingBase
00113  * @param value Valor do ponto a ser avaliado
00114  * @return Avaliacao da funcao no ponto
00115  */
00116 RootFindingDoubleT RootFindingBaseEval(RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj, RootFindingDoubleT value);
00117 
00118 /**
00119  * @brief Avalia a 2a. diferencial da funcao em um ponto
00120  * @param rootsObj Ponteiro para o objeto struct RootFindingBase
00121  * @param value Valor do ponto a ser avaliado
00122  * @return Avaliacao da 2a. dif da funcao no ponto
00123  */
00124 RootFindingDoubleT RootFindingBase2nDiffEval(RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj, RootFindingDoubleT value);
00125 
00126 /**
00127  * @brief Avalia a diferencial da funcao em um ponto
00128  * @param rootsObj Ponteiro para o objeto struct RootFindingBase
00129  * @param value Valor do ponto a ser avaliado
00130  * @return Avaliacao da dif da funcao no ponto
00131  */
00132 RootFindingDoubleT RootFindingBaseDiffEval(RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj, RootFindingDoubleT value);
00133

00135  * @brief Reinicializa o objeto struct RootFindingBase
00136  * @param rootsObj Ponteiro para o objeto struct RootFindingBase
00137  */
00138 void RootFindingBaseReset(RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj);
00139 
00140 /**
00141  * @brief Obtem o codigo de erro
00142  */
00143 int RootFindingBaseGetErrorCode(RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj);
00144 
00145 /**
00146  * @brief Obtem o codigo referente ao estado do objeto
00147  */
00148 int RootFindingBaseGetStateCode(RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj);
00149 
00150 /**
00151  * @brief Obtem a mensagem de erro
00152  */
00153 const char* RootFindingBaseGetErrorMessage(RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj);
00154 
00155 /**
00156  * @brief Obtem a mensagem referente ao estado do objeto
00157  */
00158 const char* RootFindingBaseGetStateMessage(RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj);
00159 
00160 /**
00161  * @brief Verifica se ha erros
00162  * @return TRUE caso haja erro
00163  */
00164 RootFindingBoolT RootFindingBaseHasError(RootFindingBaseT* rootsObj);
